trans-unit.source: Determines the border padding for docked controls.
trans-unit.target: 确定停靠控件的边界边距。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> class creates a margin on a given edge or all edges of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>类创建一个给定的边缘或停靠的控件的所有边缘上的边距。

trans-unit.source: You can set the width of this margin for each individual edge by setting the following properties: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Right%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置以下属性设置为每个单独的边缘此边距的宽度： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Bottom%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.Right%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set all the edges to the same width simultaneously by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.All%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以设置所有边缘为相同的宽度同时通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges.All%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the control is too large for its container, the control will be resized to fit in the container, minus the specified margin width.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的大小太大为其容器，控件将调整大小以适合在容器中，减去指定的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> properties, setting each individually on the click of the button.
trans-unit.target: 该示例停靠面板控件中的按钮，并循环浏览<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>属性，设置每个单独上按钮的单击操作。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>未在窗体和一个名为的类级别成员变量实例化`myCounter`已声明为一个 32 位带符号整数。

trans-unit.source: This code should be called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the button.
trans-unit.target: 此代码应该对调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding width for all edges of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置停靠控件的所有边缘的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width assigned to this property is applied to all edges of the docked control.
trans-unit.target: 分配给此属性的填充宽度应用于所有边缘停靠的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> properties, setting each individually on the click of the button.
trans-unit.target: 该示例停靠面板控件中的按钮，并循环浏览<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>属性，设置每个单独上按钮的单击操作。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>未在窗体和一个名为的类级别成员变量实例化`myCounter`已声明为一个 32 位带符号整数。

trans-unit.source: This code should be called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the button.
trans-unit.target: 此代码应该对调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding width for the bottom edge of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置停靠控件的下边缘的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the bottom edge of the docked control.
trans-unit.target: 填充宽度分配给此属性是仅应用于停靠控件下边缘。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> properties, setting each individually on the click of the button.
trans-unit.target: 该示例停靠面板控件中的按钮，并循环浏览<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>属性，设置每个单独上按钮的单击操作。

trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>未在窗体和一个名为的类级别成员变量实例化`myCounter`已声明为一个 32 位带符号整数。

trans-unit.target: 此代码应该对调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" /> 对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 用作特定类型的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding width for the left edge of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置停靠控件的左边缘的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the left edge of the docked control.
trans-unit.target: 填充宽度分配给此属性是仅应用于停靠的控件的左边缘。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>。

trans-unit.target: 此代码应该对调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>该按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding width for the right edge of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置停靠控件的右边缘的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the right edge of the docked control.
trans-unit.target: 填充宽度分配给此属性是仅应用于停靠的控件的右边缘。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建作为当前实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 作为当前实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding width for the top edge of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置停靠控件的顶边缘的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的边距宽度。

trans-unit.source: The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the top edge of the docked control.
trans-unit.target: 填充宽度分配给此属性是仅应用于停靠的控件上边缘。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: An empty string.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串。
